SegmentLocator.description: Unique ID generated for the segment by ItinServices

FrequentTravelerId.description: The travelerâ€™s ID for the frequent traveler reward program.

RateCode.description: The rate code for the booking.

StartCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the starting address for the booking.

EndCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the ending address for the booking.

StartLocation.description: The starting location of the booking.

EndLocation.description: The ending location of the booking.

StartAddress.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartAddress2.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartCity.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartPostalCode.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartState.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartCountry.description: The starting address of the booking.

StartOpenTime.description: The opening time for the pick-up location.

StartCloseTime.description: The closing time for the pick-up location.

EndAddress.description: The ending address for the booking.

EndAddress2.description: The ending address for the booking.

EndCity.description: The ending address for the booking.

EndPostalCode.description: The ending address for the booking.

EndState.description: The ending address for the booking.

EndCountry.description: The ending address for the booking.

StartLatitude.description: The latitude for the starting location of the booking.

StartLongitude.description: The longitude for the starting location of the booking.

EndLatitude.description: The latitude for the ending location of the booking.

EndLongitude.description: The longitude for the ending location of the booking.

EndOpenTime.description: The opening time of the dropoff location.

EndCloseTime.description: The closing time for the dropoff location.

EndPhoneNumber.description: The phone number of the dropoff location.

PickupDeliveryAddressType.description: The type of address for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryAddress1.description: The AddressLine1 for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryCity.description: The city for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryState.description: The state for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryPostalCode.description: The postal code for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryCountry.description: The country for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryLatitude.description: The latitude for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryLongitude.description: The longitude for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryCategory.description: The category for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

PickupDeliveryNumber.description: The number for the pick-up address when the rental service offers pick-up.

DropoffCollectionAddressType.description: The type of address for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionAddress1.description: The AddressLine1 for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionCity.description: City for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionState.description: The state for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionPostalCode.description: The postal code for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionCountry.description: The country for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionLatitude.description: The latitude for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionLongitude.description: The longitude for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionPhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionCityCode.description: The IATA airport code for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionCategory.description: The category of dropofff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

DropoffCollectionNumber.description: The number for the dropoff address when the rental service offers dropoff.

Class.description: Character code to indicate the class of the car. Varies by vendor. Supported values: C - Compact, E - Economy, F - Full size, I - Intermediate, L - Luxury, M - Mini, P - Premium, S - Standard, X - Special

Body.description: The body style of the car. Supported values: B - Two-door sedan, D - Four-door sedan, F - Four-wheel drive, J - All terrain, K - Truck, L - Limo, P - Pickup, R - recreation, S - Sport, T - Convertible, V - Van, W - Wagon/Estate, X - Special

Transmission.description: The character code that indicates if the car has auto-transmission. Supported values: A - Auto, M - Manual

AirCondition.description: The character code that indicates if car has air conditioner. Supported values: R - AC, N - No AC

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number for the user.

NumPersons.description: The number of people including the driver that the rental is for.

StartDateLocal.description: The booking starting time and date, in the booking locationâ€™s local time.

EndDateLocal.description: The booking ending time and date, in the booking locationâ€™s local time.

DiscountCode.description: The discount code used by the company or TMC to get a discounted rate.

SpecialInstructions.description: Additional instructions regarding the booking. Maximum length: 256

DailyRate.description: The daily rate for the booking.

TotalRate.description: The total rate amount of the booking.

RateType.description: The rate type for the booking.

IsGhostCard.description: Indicates if a payment was made using a shared corporate credit card.

CreditCardLastFour.description: Last 4 digits of the credit card used for the car segment.

CreditCardType.description: The type of the credit card used for the car segment.

SpecialEquipment.description: Any special equipment required by the renter.

IsRefundable.description: Indicates if the car segment is refundable.

Charges.description: List of charges for this booking.

IsT2Segment.description: Indicates if a segment was booked in T2

ClientLocator.description: Represents the unique identifier of the trip in an external (non-SAP Concur) system. Maximum length: 32 characters

Vendor.description: The two letter GDS vendor code.

VendorName.description: The name of the vendor. When using the Unknown Vendor Code ($$), this value appears as the vendor in the itinerary.

OperatedByVendorName.description: Name of vendor operating the car rental segment.

TimeZoneId.description: The ID for the time zone of the booking.

TimeZone.description: The time zone of the booking.

StartDateUtc.description: The booking starting time and date, in UTC.

EndDateUtc.description: The booking ending time and date, in UTC.

ConfirmationNumber.description: The confirmation number from the vendor.

DateCreatedUtc.description: The date the booking was created, in UTC.

DateCancelledUtc.description: The date the booking was cancelled, in UTC.

CancellationNumber.description: Cancellation number (proof of cancellation in the event of unexecpected no-show fee)

DateModifiedUtc.description: The date the booking was modified, in UTC.

CesId.description: ID returned from Expense when an car segment is expensed

SentToAirplus.description: Indicates if car segment was sent to Airplus.

CliqbookId.description: ID for the segment coming from Booking Services

UpgradedDateTime.description: The date and time the booking was upgraded.

IsUpgradeAllowed.description: If true, the booking can be upgraded.

IsPreferredVendor.description: If true, the rental service is marked as a preferred service by the company.

VirtualCreditCardType.description: The type of a virtual credit card.

OperatedByVendor.description: The car rental agency operating the car rental on behalf of the booked car rental agency.

Currency.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code for the booking.
